is on the lesser known side of the beautiful Dingle peninsula,

. This Northern side is dominated by the mountains, spectacular Mt Brandon, which sweep down to miles and miles golden beach. The Maherees juts out into Tralee bay and features watersports school and beaches that are a resort for surfing, windsurfing and body boarding all year round.
Miles of sandy beaches, backdrop of Mount Brandon. Friendly locals, Loads to see and do. Windsurfing, Surfing, Walking, Hiking, Fishing, Biking, Eating, Drinking, Diving, golf,
